text:
Slash | Soho, Manhattan | Full-time | Local

$: 80-140k, 0.1-0.5% equity

Slash (http://tapslash.com) is a new company that aims to change the methods of mobile communication. Our main product, Slash Keyboard, is an iOS and Android plugin makes puts Google, Foursquare, Giphy, and more available in every app you use.

We are young and growing startup in one of the best parts of Manhattan, with 12 full-time employees, hiring in the following roles:

* Web/full-stack engineer. We use a React-Django-Postgres-AWS stack and are hiring for all parts of it.

* iOS engineer. Swift and/or C++.

Contact: at mike@tapslash.com
